A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I couldn't stop laughing while reading the bad reviews. The funny part is they all make perfect sense. I loved the first Star Wars trilogy\, and unfortunately The Last Jedi is deviating from from its roots. The Resistance is now dumb AF. Leia\, or may I call her \"Neo\" (The Matrix)\, has over-natural powers now. Even Luke has his \"Matrix\" moment. Fin and Rose\, the casino\, really?? This movie was definitely an entertaining mess. At times\, I thought I was watching Space Balls Episode 2. JJ\, please do something to fix this mess on Episode 9.
